thread.title: BRIEF-Alibaba Group To Have Right To Nominate 2 Officers Or Employees

title: BRIEF-Alibaba Group To Have Right To Nominate 2 Officers Or Employees

organizations.name: brief-alibaba group to have right to nominate

text:
February 1, 2018 / 12:55 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Alibaba Group To Have Right To Nominate 2 Officers Or Employees Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Alibaba Group Holding Ltd: 
* ALIBABA GROUP-UNDER AMENDED AGREEMENT, UPON CLOSING OF ISSUANCE, CO TO HAVE RIGHT TO NOMINATE 2 OFFICERS/EMPLOYEES OF CO/UNITS TO ANT FINANCIAL BOARD ‍​ 
* ALIBABA GROUP- 2018 SAPA AMENDMENT ALSO PROVIDES ALIBABA INDEPENDENT COMMITTEE WITH NEW APPROVAL RIGHTS OVER INCREASES TO SIZE OF ANT FINANCIAL BOARD ‍​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2EuGfu9 ) Further company coverage:
